item.title: Tap and then methods in ruby
item.description: In nutshell #then return result of a block and #tap returns self class Person def initialize(name:, email:) @name = name @email = email end attr_accessor :name, :email end Person.new(name: "Bob", email: "bob@example.com") .then {|person| EmailTemplate.for(person.name, person.email)} .then {|template| Email.notify(template)} bob_for_tap = Person.new( name: "Bob for Tap", email: "bob_for_tap@example.com" ) .tap {|persone| Verificator(person)} # so at the end of block we return instance of Person
